sentences.en: A bounty of $50,000 was put on Dr. Alvarez's head.
sentences.cn: 有人悬赏50,000美元买阿尔瓦雷斯博士的人头。

sentences.en: Bounty translates into enough to do what one has agreed to do.
sentences.cn: 赠礼转译过来,就是有足够来做你所同意来做的一切.

sentences.en: Do you know why I really became a bounty hunter?
sentences.cn: 知道为什么我要当个赏金猎手 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is famous for his bounty to the poor.
sentences.cn: 他因对穷人慷慨相助而出名.

sentences.en: He thus outwent the very heart of kindness, and poured out his bounty.
sentences.cn: 他就这样拼命做着好事, 源源不断地施舍着.

sentences.en: I think we shall drink to the bounty of nature.
sentences.cn: 我想我们应该为造物主的慷慨赐予而乾杯.

sentences.en: I think we should drink to the bounty of nature.
sentences.cn: 我想我们应该为造物主的慷慨赐予而干杯.

sentences.en: My name is Domino Harvey -- I'm a bounty hunter.
sentences.cn: 吾名多米诺·哈维,赏金猎人.

sentences.en: People came from all over the world to enjoy America’s bounty.
sentences.cn: 人们从世界各地而来，享受美国的富足。

sentences.en: Remember that nature's bounty can be found all year round.
sentences.cn: 请记住,大自然的恩赐一年四季都有.

sentences.en: The bounty of a journey inside Bio 2 is mostly questions.
sentences.cn: 在生物圈二号的旅程中收获的大多是问题.

sentences.en: The charity is totally dependent on the Church's bounty.
sentences.cn: 慈善业完全依靠全体基督徒的慷慨赠予.

sentences.en: There was a bounty on his head.
They would offer a bounty of $ 100,000 for the capture of the murderer.
sentences.cn: 他们愿出十万元赏金捉拿凶手.

sentences.en: To express their thanks for the year's bounty, they reverently ask for continued blessings.
sentences.cn: 为他们一年来所受到的上苍的恩典表示感谢, 虔诚地祈求上帝继续赐福.

sentences.en: You Will Receive A Bounty For The Next Enemy You Kill.
sentences.cn: 你将从下一各杀死的敌人身上获得赏金.

phrases.tran_cn: 为获赏金捕人的人；[俚]领取佣金的代理商

trans.tran_cn: （由政府提供的）奖金，赏金，慷慨，大方，赠物，赠金
trans.tran_en: an amount of money that is given to someone by the government as a reward for doing something, especially catching or killing a criminal

trans.tran_cn: 发给…奖金等；为…而发给赏金
